{{Wired embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=PL-E52P |revision=A1 (DUO) |upc= |ean= |asin=B00M458XGW;GB, |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=Powerline Adapter |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=CEE 7/4 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA7450;QCA7450-AL3C; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=HomePlug AFE/Line Driver;Atheros;AR1540;;1; |flags=HomePlug AV2, SISO |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|600Mbps Gigabit Powerline Adapter}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Networking/PLE52PPLE52P_DUO/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model=PLE52PPLE52P_DUO}}
Sold in a 2-pack as the '''PL-E52P DUO'''
===See also=== *[[Actiontec PWR500]] - AR7420/AR1540 ([https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/31875-actiontec-pwr500-and-trendnet-tpl-406e2k-powerline-adapters-reviewed SNB]) *[[ASUS PL-E41]] - AR7420/AR1540 *[[ASUS PL-E52P]] - QCA7450/AR1540/AR8035 *[[ASUS PL-E56P]] - QCA7500/AR8035 *[[D-Link DHP-500AV]] - AR7400/AR1500/AR8021 ([https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/31624-homeplug-av-500-adapter-roundup?start=1 SNB]) *[[D-Link DHP-600AV_A1]] - QCA7450/AR1540/AR8035 ([http://www.tomshardware.com/reviews/homeplug-av2-powerline-networking-adapters,4218-2.html THW]) *[[TP-LINK TL-PA6010]] - QCA7450/AR1540/AR8035 ([http://www.tomshardware.com/reviews/homeplug-av2-powerline-networking-adapters,4218-3.html THW]) *[[TP-LINK TL-PA8010]] - QCA7500/AR8035 *[[TRENDnet TPL-406E]] - AR7420/AR1540 ([https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/31875-actiontec-pwr500-and-trendnet-tpl-406e2k-powerline-adapters-reviewed SNB]) *[[TRENDnet TPL-408E]] - QCA7450/AR1540/AR8035 ([http://www.tomshardware.com/reviews/homeplug-av2-powerline-networking-adapters,4218-4.html THW]) *[[TRENDnet TPL-420E]] - QCA7500/AR8035 *[[ZyXEL PLA5215]] - QCA7450/AR1540/AR8035 ([http://www.tomshardware.com/reviews/homeplug-av2-powerline-networking-adapters,4218-5.html THW]) ST&T *[[ZyXEL PLA5405]] - QCA7500/AR8035
